description:
Sanji spends the day with a very old chef who teaches him the secret of packing amazing flavor into each and every dish!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sanji Shougeki! Nazo no Jiisan to Gekiuma Ryouri
Sanji estomaqué ! Le grand père mystérieux et sa cuisine succulente !
Sanji`s Shock! Mysterious Old Man and His Super Yummy Cooking
Санджи сражён! Загадочный старец с бесподобной едой
صدمة سانجي! عجوز غامض وطبخه اللّذيذ للغاية!
サンジ衝撃! 謎の爺さんと激ウマ料理
